channel.title: How to make npcs talk in project 16 v.4.5
channel.description: How do i make npc's talk for project 16? like santa saying marry christmas from Owner jay and make my taures gurads say welcome to killscape2 and owner jay is off line or online???? please help me.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 04, 2006, 09:27:51 PM[/size][hr]please help

item.title: How to make npcs talk in project 16 v.4.5
item.dc:creator: @the_server the server
item.description:
@the_server wrote:

Goto NPCHandler.java, press ctrl + F and in the bar that pops up, type in Moo, you should see:

npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2643) { if (misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "What a noob!"; } }

After that last } press enter and add this after editing the code to your liking:

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID HERE) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOUR TEXT HERE"; } }

See? Simple. Hope it helped.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make npcs talk in project 16 v.4.5
